original: Lindelöf, Eric Gerhard Ludvig, köpman, Göteborg, f. 24/2/08 i Gbg av konsul Bernhard L. o. Ebba Almqvist. G. 41 m. Inga-Karin Lundwall. Barn : Louise f. 42, Marianne 43, Knut 45. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs h. latin 27, DHS 29. Stud:res. t. Engl., Tyskl., Belg., Frankr., Ital. o. Schweiz. Medarb. i firma Lindelöf & Co. i Gbg fr. 30, del-äg. sed. 39. Led. av styr. f. Skand. Jute-, Spinneri- & Väfveri A-B i Oskarström, Thorsten Brunius & Co. A-B, Hånsfors Bruks A-B o. Nyboholms A-B. Medi. av Frimurarorden. Hobbies: modern konst, golf.
translated: Lindelöf, Eric Gerhard Ludvig, merchant, Gothenburg, b. 24/2/08 in Gothenburg to consul Bernhard L. and Ebba Almqvist. Married in 1941 to Inga-Karin Lundwall. Children: Louise b. 1942, Marianne b. 1943, Knut b. 1945. - Graduated from Gothenburg High Latin School in 1927, DHS in 1929. Studied in England, Germany, Belgium, France, Italy, and Switzerland. Employed at Lindelöf & Co. in Gothenburg since 1930, became a part-owner in 1939. Board member of Scandinavian Jute, Spinning, and Weaving Ltd. in Oskarström, Thorsten Brunius & Co. Ltd., Hånsfors Bruks Ltd., and Nyboholms Ltd. member of the Freemasons' Order. Hobbies: modern art, golf.

memberOfBoard.name: Scandinavian Jute, Spinning, and Weaving Ltd.
